name: Soap!
description:
In this game you'll have to fight against the slipperiness of soap bars. Anyone who used a bar of soap knows what I'm talking about.
 
No randomness is added to the catch dynamic, if you click with the right timing you'll catch the bar.
 
Also note that the difficulty is based on the current score you're at, influencing the "safe area" and the speed at which the soap will fly away.
